characterInfo.Title(s): Horneater, Bridge Four Lieutenant,  Bridge Four Quartermaster
characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription: Numuhukumakiaki'aialunamor is a poem about a rock that Rock's father found before he was born. It is the full Unkalaki name by which Lunamor (i.e., Rock) is known amongst his family members.
